nws_periods.name: Today
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 80. Northeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
